text: An outdoor bronze sculpture of Chester A. Arthur by artist George Edwin Bissell and architect James Brown Lord is installed at Madison Square Park in Manhattan, New York. Cast in 1898 and dedicated on June 13, 1899, the statue rests on a Barre Granite pedestal. ==See also== * 1899 in art ==References== ==External links== * Category:1899 establishments in New York (state) Category:1899 sculptures Category:Bronze sculptures in Manhattan Category:Cultural depictions of Chester A. Arthur Category:Monuments and memorials in Manhattan Category:Outdoor sculptures in Manhattan Category:Sculptures of men in New York City Category:Statues in New York City Arthur, Chester A. Category:Flatiron District
title: Statue of Chester A. Arthur
